#include <iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i,j;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        long int a[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>a[i];
        sort(a,a+n);
        i=0;
        j=n-1;
        if(n%2!=0)
        {
            while((j-i)>=2)
            {
                cout<<a[j]<<" "<<a[i]<<" ";
                j--;
                i++;
            }
            cout<<a[j];
        }
        else
        {
            while(i<j)
            {
                cout<<a[j]<<" "<<a[i]<<" ";
                j--;
                i++;
            }
        }
        cout<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
